about_the_game:
The game is a cyber-space infiltration game that supports up to 4-player cooperation. In this game, players step into a futuristic cyberspace filled with technological wonders and dangers. Their mission is to infiltrate target locations, steal crucial items, and successfully evacuate, all of which require close cooperation between players.
This game not only provides players with thrilling gaming experiences but also encourages teamwork and communication among players. Each player assumes a different role with unique skills and abilities, making each game a fresh challenge. Some players might excel at hacking security systems, some might be adept combatants, while others could be stealth and theft experts. Only through clever strategies and coordinated actions can missions be successfully completed.
The cyber-space in the game is brimming with high-tech gadgets and challenging enemies. Players need to utilize various tools and skills to evade surveillance systems, bypass security personnel, and complete objectives without raising too much attention. At the same time, players must constantly watch out for the safety of their team members and support each other in times of crisis, ensuring everyone evacuates smoothly.
